descriptionHtml:
-Requeriments-
You only need Apachy hair mod for females. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
I recommend have installed too the eyes of beauty: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
And better females(optional): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812
-Installation-
Copy the files to data folder in skyrim directory.

Bugs: If lydia dont change, change the name of esp and bsa files.
author: Ggogeta
